secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with classic board games can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "dice" and "tokens".

Based on the examples "dice" and "tokens," the secret rule might relate to objects commonly used in games or activities involving elements of chance or strategy. Both "dice" and "tokens" are small objects typically found in board games, suggesting the rule could be that the items are "components or items used in board games or tabletop games."
Correct! The rule is Only items that are typically associated with classic board games can be brought to the picnic.
